Requested permissions

  • RECEIVE_MMS -Trigger redirect after MMS message arrival (foreground and background)
  • RECEIVE_SMS -Trigger redirect after message arrival (foreground and background)
  • RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH -Trigger redirect after WAP message arrival
  • SEND_SMS - To transfer your desired SMS to another phone device

Information that your provide

Your incomming and outgoing SMS

How we access data

In case the data is necessary for the applicatio to work like you need , we request dynaic permission to grant Android permissions, We will have access to this data as long as these permissions are garanted to us. You can always manage app permissions in your phone settings

How we use this data

The data is necessary for the implementations of the core application functionalities as described on the application page.
In some cases of using our application, namely:

  • Sending SMS to e-mail using our server
  • Sending SMS to Slack, Telegram, Discord

Your SMS data will be sent via encrypted HTTPS secure channel to the server, so that initiates the sending of SMS information to the location specified.


After that, the data on SMS, the purpose of sending (-mail,slack channel in Slack, etc..) will be deleted. We do not store this data after function has been executed.
